title: Scabion 20G Cream
details: This medication is used to treat scabies
precautions: Before using crotamiton, tell your doctor or pharmacist if you are allergic to it; or if you have any other allergies. This product may contain inactive ingredients, which can cause allergic reactions or other problems. Talk to your pharmacist for more details. Before using this medication, tell your doctor or pharmacist your medical history. This medication is for use on the skin only. Do not take this medication by mouth. Avoid applying crotamiton on the face, eyes, mouth, vagina, and any skin that is inflamed, raw, or oozing fluid. It is unknown if this drug passes into breast milk. Consult your doctor before breast-feeding.
effects: Worsening skin irritation (such as itching, redness) may occur. If any of these effects persist or worsen, stop using this medication and tell your doctor or pharmacist promptly.

effects: Burning,Stinging,Pruritus,Erythema,Rash.

If it gets extreme, then wash it eventually.Converse with a drug specialist for more details.In case you are allergic to Lotrix, inform your doctor before using it.Share a list of all the products that you are using (including herbal and allopathic) with your doctor prior to use Lotrix.Consult a doctor before using Lotrix if you are breastfeeding or pregnant.Avoid using Lotrix without consulting with your doctor if you have renal or liver issues.Prior to utilizing this medicine, consult a specialist or drug specialist about the clinical history, particularly of: skin diseases, asthma. title: Lotrix 60ML Lotion
details:
Lotrix lotion is an anti-parasitic medical lotion used for treating head lice and scabies (tiny insects that cause itch and irritation on your scalp). It is one of the gsk (Glaxo Smith Kline) products and is widely used in Pakistan. GSK is known

READ MORE
precautions: Every product should be used with care to avoid unwanted consequences which may be severe in some cases. So following are some precautionary measures that help in the safe use of Lotrix lotion.Use after consultation with your doctor and do not exceed the advised dose.Also, tell the doctor about the medicines or lotions you are using with Lotrix lotion.If you are using the lotion on your own, you must be aware of the substances you are allergic to.Tell the doctor in case of pregnancy and breastfeeding.Do not use the lotion if you have asthma as this lotion is noted to cause difficulty in breathing in some consumers.Reach out of reach of children and do not apply it to kids under two years.Do not apply it to your eyes, nose, ears and mouth.In case the lotion gets into your eyes, rinse it with plenty of water.Do not continue to use if you face any severe side effects.Keep the lotion away from sunlight—store at room temperature.
effects: As it contains permethrin, so there are some adverse effects associated with it. Some common Lotrix lotion side effects areIrritation and redness on skin and scalp.Nausea, headache and excessive salivation are also observed because Lotrix lotion has the property of slight penetration.Muscle weakness is also witnessed after an overdose.Rash and other allergic symptoms can also be observed depending on the condition of scabies or the components that irritates your skin.In rare cases, the area may be filled with puss, and it will cause pain and redness.The sensation of burning or numbness on the skin or scalp can occur.

title: Scabfree 60ML Lotion
details:

precautions: Before using the product, inform the doctor about your complete medical history in detail.Read the leaflet carefully, and do not use the product in case you are allergic to any of the substances present in it.Read the instructions carefully before using the product.Do not keep on scratching the head on the skin because it can cause bacterial infections.If you have a history of medical issues related to breathing problems, do not use the product. This medication should be used on the external side only. Please do not use it near sensitive areas such as genitals or eyes. This product can be used during pregnancy or the breastfeeding phase because it does not cause any severe harm unless you are allergic to any of the ingredients present in it. However, it is better to use the doctor's consultation only. Do not use the product if you feel an extreme burning sensation on the scalp or skin after applying the product. Do not use the expired product.Use with caution having skin infections and asthma.
effects: These medications have some side effects, and most of the side effects are related to the skin. If you feel any of the following side-effects after using the ointment, immediately stop using the ointment. Itching or burning sensation in the scalp or skinRedness on the skinSwelling or Inflammation Tingling sensation on the site where the medicine is applied.Allergic reactions from any substances present in the medicine may cause serious problems like shortness of breath, chest tightness, or sore throat.Hypersensitivity due to the excessive use of the medication.Skin irritation, Including itching, Swelling and redness.

title: Scabion 60ML Lotion
details:
Scabion lotion is used to treat Scabies. Scabies is a skin condition caused by the bites of mites. Mite bite can cause severe irritation and allergies. Scabion lotion kills the mites that cause these allergies. It provides relief from itching and

READ MORE
precautions: Before using the product, it is always better to read the leaflet thoroughly and also discuss your medical condition, such as any kind of allergies or other skin conditions that you might have with your doctor.This medication does not have an appropriate time to start working. It works differently for every individual. Some people might observe the betterment in condition earlier than others.People with sensitive skins shouldn't be using this medication until and unless it is absolutely necessary. The same goes for pregnant women and breastfeeding mothers; all the consequences and benefits should be discussed beforehand with the doctor to avoid any kind of risk or harmful effects on the unborn child or infant.Numbness and tingling sensation are quite common with the use of this medication. This lotion makes the affected area numb temporarily and provides you relief from the itching and burning sensation.Before using crotamiton, tell your doctor or pharmacist if you are allergic to it; or if you have any other allergies. This product may contain inactive ingredients, which can cause allergic reactions or other problems. Talk to your pharmacist for more details. Before using this medication, tell your doctor or pharmacist your medical history. This medication is for use on the skin only. Do not take this medication by mouth. Avoid applying crotamiton on the face, eyes, mouth, vagina, and any skin that is inflamed, raw, or oozing fluid. It is unknown if this drug passes into breast milk. Consult your doctor before breast-feeding.
effects: Scabion lotion does not have any serious side effects, but some of the side effects that might be experienced by a few of the individuals are as follows. These side-effects are less serious and go away on their own.Loss of hair is quite common with the use of this medication. It happens because of the dry texture of the lotion. This is temporary, and hair gets better once you stop using the product.Burning and Itching sensation is also a common side-effect of this product. It feels itchy and burns a bit when you first apply the lotion to the affected area.Extreme redness or rashes is quite concerning. In such cases, immediately stop using the medication and inform the doctor.Worsening skin irritation (such as itching, redness) may occur. If any of these effects persist or worsen, stop using this medication and tell your doctor or pharmacist promptly.

title: Ess Anti Scabies 60ML Lotion
details: Topical anti-scabies medicine that is indicated for the treatment of scabies.
precautions: Consult a doctor if you're hypersensitive to any of its ingredients. Keep out of the reach of children. Store at room temperature, i.e. below 30 degrees Celsius.
effects: No side effects are reported yet. However, you should consult a doctor if it causes any kinds of adverse reactions to you. In the rare amount of cases, it may cause skin allergies, i.e. irritation, itching, rashes, redness & swelling/inflammation on the skin, dryness, etc.
